0.name: Shotgun
0.info:
Very High Damage
Low Penetration
Limited Range

1.name: Long
1.info:
High Damage
Strong Penetration
Long Range

2.name: Medium
2.info:
Moderate Damage
Moderate Penetration
Medium Range

3.name: Compact
3.info:
Low Damage
Low Penetration
Medium Range

4.name: Special
4.info:
Very High Damage
Very Strong Penetration
Medium Range

5.name: Nagant M1895 High Velocity Ammo
5.description: A hot-loaded bullet with a strong powder charge combined with a lighter projectile tip significantly boosts the muzzle velocity, but increases recoil slightly. Great for ranged combat.

stats.name: Capacity
stats.info: Bullets capacity in the gun.

stats.name: Damage
stats.info: Damage value of a shot that hits a Hunter in the upper-torso at 10 meters. For Shotguns: Average damage at 10 meters at center mass.

stats.name: Effective Range
stats.info: The range (meters) that will kill a Hunter in one hit - usually a heashot.

stats.name: Rate of Fire
stats.info: Shots fired per minute, including time to reload.

stats.name: Cycle Time
stats.info: The time (seconds) this needs to ready for the next shot, including time to reload if necessary. For Dual Wield: The time it takes for the weapon that shot first to ready again.

stats.name: Spread
stats.info: The relative crosshair spread of this while aiming form the hip. Shotguns have a comparatively wider spread.

stats.name: Sway
stats.info: The relative amount of weapon sway while ADS.

stats.name: Vertical Recoil
stats.info: The strength of the vertical recoil (degrees) after a shot.

stats.name: Reload Speed
stats.info: The time (in seconds) it takes to fully reload the weapon when empty, including any special behavior such as clip reloading.

stats.name: Muzzle Velocity
stats.info: The velocity (meters per second) at which the projectile will travel. Heavier projectiles (such as crossbow bolts) travel in a ballistic arc.

stats.name: Melee Damage
stats.info: True damage value of a regular melee attack tha hits a Hunter in the Upper-Torso.

stats.name: Heavy Melee Damage
stats.info: True damage value of a charged heavy melee attack tha hits a Hunter in the Upper-Torso.

stats.name: Stamina Consumption
stats.info: The stamina consumed with a heavy melee attack.

6.name: Nagant M1895 Poison Ammo
6.description: This bullet shatters on impact, releasing a toxic agent fatal in high dises, but cannot penetrate surfaces.
